ygData.subject: Re: Adventure Stone?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am wondering: does every player hear the voice, or is it supposed to be geared toward level 20+ players? I hear the voice with both my level 10 halfling
ygData.messageBody:
I am wondering: does every player hear the voice, or is it supposed
to be geared toward level 20+ players? I hear the voice with both my
level 10 halfling cleric and my level 8 barbarian warrior...

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Mac" <bigmaca3@y...> wrote:
> You have to go to the city you started in and you should hear a
> second voice. If you've managed to piss them off you can got to WK
> near the undead camp or Rathe Mtns at the Gypses. They will tell
you
> who to talk to and what to say. Then find the Wayfarer camp you
were
> directed to and your in!
>
> Good luck. My low level alt have no trouble in LDoN. Of course
he's
> a Troll Warrior!
>
> Tuldayen Grimblade
> Pathfinder of Tunare
> Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm.
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Nefrahari@a... wrote:
> > I'm hoping someone can remind me about this... I got the LDoN
> message about
> > who to speak to for the adventure stone when I was level 16, and
> since I wasn't
> > at 20 yet, I didn't do it. Now that I'm at 22, I can't remember
who
> it was I
> > was supposed to talk to. Who is the person in Halas that gives
you
> the stone?
> >
> > Jenn
> >
> > "Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
